About pydra-ants
================

`Pydra`_ is a dataflow engine which provides a set of lightweight abstractions for DAG construction, manipulation, and distributed execution.

`ANTs`_ is an open source package for the analysis and visualization of structural, functional, and diffusion neuroimaging data from cross-sectional and longitudinal studies.

pydra-ants provides Pydra tasks for running and composing FreeSurfer commands.
